name: Join my Cult
description:
Join my Cult is a wacky little side scroller with many quirks. Collect 10 Devotees and become the successful cult leader of your dreams!

Join my Cult is a Java Game made for my Intro to Game Programming Class. 

I made all the funky pixel art!

Music and sounds are from various royalty free websites. 

The zip file provided is the Java code. You can load that into an Java IDE (my preference is the Eclipse IDE) and run the code.
